typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['EXP_HR_S3/*.avro'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> S3Dump
S3Dump sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['ALPIQ_DLT_EXP_HR_REP_20200703181006.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ParquetGeneralization
